segments.source_content: ## Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、React Native 命令行界面、JDK 以及 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何編輯器開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置建置 React Native Android 應用程式所需的工具鏈。

segments.source_content: Node

translations.zh-hant: Node

segments.source_content: Follow the [installation instructions for your Linux distribution](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/) to install Node 18.18 or newer.

translations.zh-hant: 請依照 [Linux 發行版的安裝說明](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/) 安裝 Node 18.18 或更新版本。

segments.source_content: Java Development Kit

translations.zh-hant: Java 開發套件 (JDK)

segments.source_content: React Native currently recommends version 17 of the Java SE Development Kit (JDK). You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions. You may download and install [OpenJDK](https://openjdk.java.net) from [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/) or your system packager.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 目前推薦使用 Java SE 開發套件 (JDK) 第 17 版。使用更高版本的 JDK 可能會遇到問題。您可以從 [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/) 下載並安裝 [OpenJDK](https://openjdk.java.net)，或透過系統套件管理器安裝。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android 開發環境

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您是 Android 開發新手，設置開發環境可能會有些繁瑣。若您已熟悉 Android 開發，則只需進行部分配置。無論哪種情況，請務必仔細遵循接下來的步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. 安裝 Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若複選框呈灰色，您稍後仍有機會安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 完成安裝並顯示歡迎畫面後，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. 安裝 Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生程式碼建置 React Native 應用程式需要特定的 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK。可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理器安裝其他 Android SDK。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "Configure" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 開啟 Android Studio 後，點擊「Configure」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到 SDK 管理器，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK 管理器中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，然後勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` 項目，確保以下項目已勾選：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` 或 `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the "Android SDK Build-Tools" entry, then make sure that `34.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著選擇「SDK Tools」標籤頁，同樣勾選「Show Package Details」。找到並展開「Android SDK Build-Tools」項目，確保選中 `34.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. 配置 ANDROID_HOME 環境變數

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具需要設置某些環境變數才能建置含原生程式碼的應用程式。

segments.source_content: Add the following lines to your `$HOME/.bash_profile` or `$HOME/.bashrc` (if you are using `zsh` then `~/.zprofile` or `~/.zshrc`) config file:

translations.zh-hant: 將以下內容加入您的 `$HOME/.bash_profile` 或 `$HOME/.bashrc` 設定檔（若使用 `zsh` 則為 `~/.zprofile` 或 `~/.zshrc`）：

segments.source_content:
```shell
export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_eb80afe1

segments.source_content: > `.bash_profile` is specific to `bash`. If you're using another shell, you will need to edit the appropriate shell-specific config file.

translations.zh-hant: > `.bash_profile` 是 `bash` 專用的。若使用其他 shell，需編輯對應的 shell 設定檔。

segments.source_content: Type `source $HOME/.bash_profile` for `bash` or `source $HOME/.zprofile` to load the config into your current shell. Verify that ANDROID_HOME has been set by running `echo $ANDROID_HOME` and the appropriate directories have been added to your path by running `echo $PATH`.

translations.zh-hant: 對於 `bash` 使用者請輸入 `source $HOME/.bash_profile`，或輸入 `source $HOME/.zprofile` 以載入設定檔至當前 shell。執行 `echo $ANDROID_HOME` 確認 ANDROID_HOME 變數是否已設定，並執行 `echo $PATH` 檢查相關目錄是否已加入路徑中。

segments.source_content: > Please make sure you use the correct Android SDK path. You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 請務必使用正確的 Android SDK 路徑。您可以在 Android Studio 的「設定」對話框中找到 SDK 實際位置，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Watchman

translations.zh-hant: Watchman

segments.source_content: Follow the [Watchman installation guide](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install#buildinstall) to compile and install Watchman from source.

translations.zh-hant: 請依照 [Watchman 安裝指南](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install#buildinstall) 從原始碼編譯並安裝 Watchman。

segments.source_content: > [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install) is a tool by Facebook for watching changes in the filesystem. It is highly recommended you install it for better performance and increased compatibility in certain edge cases (translation: you may be able to get by without installing this, but your mileage may vary; installing this now may save you from a headache later).

translations.zh-hant: > [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install) 是 Facebook 開發的檔案系統監控工具。強烈建議安裝以提升效能，並在特定邊緣案例中增強相容性（譯註：不安裝可能勉強能運作，但效果因環境而異；現在安裝可避免後續潛在問題）。

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: 準備 Android 裝置

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要一台 Android 裝置來執行 React Native Android 應用程式。可以是實體 Android 裝置，或更常見的做法是使用 Android 虛擬裝置 (AVD) 在電腦上模擬 Android 環境。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論採用何種方式，都需要先將裝置設定為開發模式以執行 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: 使用實體裝置

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 若擁有實體 Android 裝置，可透過 USB 連接線連接電腦後，依照[此處說明](running-on-device.md)設定為開發用途，無需使用 AVD。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: 使用虛擬裝置

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 若透過 Android Studio 開啟 `./AwesomeProject/android` 專案，可點選 AVD Manager 圖示（外觀如下）查看可用虛擬裝置清單：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_46cf9aca

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 image.

translations.zh-hant: 若剛安裝 Android Studio，可能需要[建立新 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」後，從清單任選手機型號點擊「Next」，接著選取 **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 系統映像檔。

segments.source_content: > We recommend configuring [VM acceleration](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/emulator-acceleration.html#vm-linux) on your system to improve performance. Once you've followed those instructions, go back to the AVD Manager.

translations.zh-hant: > 建議設定 [VM 加速](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/emulator-acceleration.html#vm-linux)以提升效能。完成設定後請返回 AVD Manager。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「Next」後選擇「Finish」建立 AVD。此時應可點選 AVD 旁的綠色三角形按鈕啟動模擬器。

segments.source_content: That's it!

translations.zh-hant: 大功告成！

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You successfully set up your development environment.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功設定開發環境。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_45444c80

segments.source_content: Now what?

- If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).
- If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant:
- 若要將此 React Native 專案整合至現有應用程式，請參閱[整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。
- 若想深入瞭解 React Native，請查看[React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
